name: Jumping Chaaho
description:
Jumping Chaaho is a simple game. But a challenging game too.

This Arcade game is a combination of Endless game and Platformer game.

Players need to make jump our hero "Chaaho" up and across the moving platforms without falling down.

Game features:
1.The player only needs to operate with one hand, just a tap on screen to make our hero jump.
2.For each replay background color of game changes.
3.And there is Leaderboard, to which you can upload your score and compete between players across the world.

Gameplay:
There are more than 5 types of platforms moves across the space vertically. When they touch the sides of your phone screen, speed changes. Our hero "Chaaho" must jump through each of them towards infinity. Just a simple tap on your phones screen make "Chaaho" jump. Each step on each platform gives one score add on. If "Chaaho" miss the platform, fall down. And game end. This is an endless game, you can score as high as you want.
